tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driver_schedule (
    driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shift_date DATE,
    shift_start_time TIME,
    shift_end_time TIME,
    performance_metric INT
);

CREATE TABLE driver_schedules (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id UUID NOT NULL,
  shift_date DATE NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id UUID NOT NULL,
  shift_date DATE NOT NULL,
  completed_tasks INT NOT NULL,
  efficiency_percentage FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE shifts ( 
    shift_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    driver_id INT REFERENCES driver_schedules(driver_id), 
    start_date DATE, 
    end_date DATE, 
    shift_type VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics ( 
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    driver_id INT REFERENCES driver_schedules(driver_id), 
    shift_id INT REFERENCES shifts(shift_id), 
    metric_name VARCHAR(255), 
    metric_value FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  shift_id INT,
  productivity_score INT,
  safety_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE workforce_management (
  management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  shift_id INT,
  schedule_id INT,
  performance_metric_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_id INT,
    shift_id INT,
    metric_type VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE workforce_management (
    management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_id INT,
    shift_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    workforce_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    transport_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_id INT,
    shift_id INT,
    transport_type VARCHAR(50),
    transport_date DATE
);
